title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Saturday, September 9 (game #593)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: Chromecast with Google TV leak reveals new controller with 'magic' button
description: Discovered within the files of the Android TV 14 Beta, the future Chromecast remote may feature a new button layout.

title: Microsoft ending third-party printer driver support is good news for you
description: Microsoft announced that it's ending third-party printer driver support, and will require manufacturers to use first-party drivers instead.

title: The Tech-Savvy Guide to Living With Less Worry with Verizon Mobile Protect
description: From replacement batteries to cracked screen repairs to managing your data, Verizon Mobile Protect is ready to help you dive into your journey with less worry and more fun.

title: Spotify could soon take on Audible with free audiobooks for subscribers
description: Spotify is planning to launch a new pilot program for audiobooks but only for a limited time.

title: This tiny adapter will upgrade your Mac or PC with next-gen Bluetooth for the new era of earbuds
description: Creative's adapter brings Bluetooth LE Audio and LC3 for all! Well, for many – you'll need compatible headphones, still.

title: Dell's new gaming monitor offers 500Hz refresh rate at a more affordable price
description: The Alienware AW2524HF keeps the older model's great performance but Dell did cut out a few features.

title: Hisense upstages TCL by adding a gigantic 100-inch micro-LED TV
description: Hisense has announced a new 100-inch version of two of its most popular models for the UK and US, adding to the ever competitive big screen TV market.

title: Assassin’s Creed 4: Black Flag can no longer be bought on Steam
description: Ubisoft has seemingly removed Assassin’s Creed 4: Black Flag from Steam.

title: Smartphone sales could be set for a rebound sooner than expected
description: European consumers might soon start refreshing their phones, market analysts are saying.

title: Procreate is releasing a new iPad app for animation - and it looks incredible
description: Procreate's new animation application, Procreate Dreams, will leverage some of the iPad's best features for powerful, easy-to-use creative workflows.

title: Microsoft says it will defend AI Copilot users from copyright infringement lawsuits
description: Microsoft assumes full responsibility for GenAI-produced work, saving companies from potentially expensive legal challenges.

title: Rule the school with the ultimate in PC power

description: Microsoft is phasing out Windows Troubleshooters, over the next three years, aiming to enhance security and user support.

title: EA Sports UFC 5 has an official release date
description: Electronic Arts has announced the release date for EA Sports UFC 5.

title: Gaming marketplace Traderie alerts users to data breach
description: Sensitive data was stolen, Traderie confirms, with the hackers claiming 2.6 million users were affected.

title: The EU won't force Apple to open up iMessage - at least not yet

title: Update your iPhone and Mac now - Apple has fixed two major security bugs
description: Both zero-day bugs can be used to run malicious code remotely against iPhone and Mac devices.

description: Creative's adapter brings Bluetooth LE Audio and LC3 for all! Well, for many – you'll need compatible headphones, still.

title: Mullvad and Tailscale join forces in the name of online security

title: The demand for hybrid working isn't going anywhere

title: One Piece season 2's scripts are done, but the hit Netflix show won't return any time soon

description: Companies are recovering less data after incidents than they were before, putting themselves at serious risk.

title: Microsoft is rolling out a fix to one of the most annoying Outlook quirks
